successes.title: TGG2: Light and Darkness
successes.description: Raging Heroes' Toughest Girls of the Galaxy are back! 6 new armies of miniatures: Sisters, Dark Elves, Lust Elves, in Fantasy + Sci-Fi.

Pledges.description: ROOKIE - Our most sincere thanks + a lavishly designed Digital Artbook featuring the art of the Toughest Girls of the Galaxy 2 (Retail value $14). Designed as a real Digital coffee table book, it will include all the TGG concept art, many unreleased sketches, stories and background, images of 3D sculpts and photos of the painted minis, embedded videos of concept art drawing and 3D sculpting, and more... A very special treat if you like the TGG2 : Light&Darkness!
PRIVATE BOX - Choose $15 worth of any TGG2 minis + get the Digital Artbook.

Note: If you want more minis or add-ons, simply increase the amount of your pledge.
* Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
FIRST CLASS BOX - Choose $50 worth of any TGG2 minis + get the Digital Artbook.

Note: If you want more minis or add-ons, simply increase the amount of your pledge.
* Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)

Note: If you want more minis or add-ons, simply increase the amount of your pledge.
* Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
